text: The Time That Remains is a 2009 British Italian Belgian French Palestinian Israel black comedy drama movie directed by Elia Suleiman (who also stars) and also starring Ali Suliman, Saleh Bakri, Zidane Awad, Yasmine Haj, Izabel Ramadan. ==Other websites== * * The Time That Remains at Facebook * Category:2009 comedy movies Category:2009 drama movies Category:2000s black comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Palestinian movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Movies directed by Elia Suleiman
title: The Time That Remains
